Text:
I'm at 99.6% for 2 days!
Please seed the remaining .4%!
This did not work for me past the first 6 seconds. Bad torrent. Look for other (alas, only SD) versions.

Serious audio problems. Sound drops out completely for a second in many places, often losing the last word in dialogue sequences. Subtitles saved the day for me. Mostly in synch, but some obvious places where it isn't. Quality doesn't live up to the large size. You may as well download a smaller one.

As others have said, the Diverse rip goes out of synch when played on a standalone media player, like a portable hard drive connected to a TV, but perfectly in synch when played with VLC on a computer. It also stays in synch when burned to a DVD. I recommend the smaller Diverse rip as long as you aren't using your TV's media player. It's better quality than this bloated rip.
